heroTitle: Coffee, Conversations, and a Cozy Corner.
heroSubtitle: A neighborhood café serving handcrafted brews and warm bakes.

brandStory.title: From a tiny roaster to your favorite corner.
brandStory.paragraph1: We started with a simple idea: good coffee tastes better with good company. What began as a home roaster and a few friends is now a warm, welcoming space for everyone.
brandStory.paragraph2: Our beans are ethically sourced and roasted in small batches. The aromas change with the seasons, but the feeling stays the same — familiar, cozy, and full of stories.
